00010 PulseCandidateFinder::PulseCandidateFinder(TPulseIsland* pulse): fPulseIsland(pulse) {
00011 
00012   std::string detname = TSetupData::Instance()->GetDetectorName(fPulseIsland->GetBankName());
00013   IDs::channel theChannel = detname;
00014 
00015   // We have a different algorithm for fast and slow pulses
00016   if (theChannel == IDs::Fast) {
00017 
00018     int rise = 0; // the parameter for this algorithm
00019     switch(theChannel.Detector()) {
00020     default:
00021       rise = 100; // TODO: pick a better default and hopefully parameters for all channels
00022       break;
00023     }
00024 
00025     FindCandidatePulses_Fast(rise);
00026   }
00027   else if (theChannel == IDs::Slow) {
00028 
00029     int threshold = 0; // the parameter for this algorithm
00030     switch(theChannel.Detector()) {
00031     default:
00032       threshold = 0; // TODO: pick a better default and hopefully parameters for all channels
00033       break;
00034     }
00035 
00036     FindCandidatePulses_Slow(threshold);
00037   }
00038 }

00045 std::vector<TPulseIsland*> PulseCandidateFinder::GetPulseCandidates() {
00046 
00047   // Get the output ready
00048   std::vector<TPulseIsland*> pulse_candidates;
00049 
00050   // Loop through the pulse candidate locations
00051   for (std::vector<Location>::iterator locationIter = fPulseCandidateLocations.begin(); locationIter != fPulseCandidateLocations.end(); ++locationIter) {
00052     
00053     // Get the start and stop locations
00054     int start_location = (*locationIter).start;
00055     int stop_location = (*locationIter).stop;
00056 
00057     // Get the bank name and work out what the new timestamp will be
00058     std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00059     int new_timestamp = fPulseIsland->GetTimeStamp() + start_location;
00060 
00061     // Get the samples from the original TPI and have a new one ready for the pulse candidate
00062     const std::vector<int>& theSamples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00063     std::vector<int> theNewSamples;
00064 
00065     // Loop through the samples between the start and stop locations and add them to the new samples vector
00066     for (int iSample = start_location; iSample <= stop_location; ++iSample) {
00067       theNewSamples.push_back(theSamples.at(iSample));
00068     }
00069 
00070     TPulseIsland* pulse_island = new TPulseIsland(new_timestamp, theNewSamples, bankname);
00071     pulse_candidates.push_back(pulse_island);
00072   }
00073 
00074   return pulse_candidates;
00075 }
00076 
00079 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Fast(int rise) {
00080 
00081   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00082   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00083   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);
00084   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00085 
00086   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00087   bool found = false;
00088   Location location;
00089 
00090   // Loop through the samples
00091   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00092     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - pedestal);
00093     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00094     ds = s2 - s1;
00095 
00096     if (found) {
00097       if (s2 < 0) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00098         location.stop = (int)i;
00099         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00100         found = false;
00101       }
00102     } else {
00103       if (ds > rise) {
00104         found = true;
00105         location.start = (int)(i - 1);
00106       }
00107     }
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00113 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Slow(int threshold) {
00114 
00115   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00116   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00117   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);
00118   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00119 
00120   int sample_height; // the sample's height above pedestal
00121   int start, stop; // the start and stop location
00122   bool found = false;
00123   Location location;
00124 
00125   // Loop through the samples
00126   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00127     sample_height = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00128 
00129     if (found) {
00130       if (sample_height < 0) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00131         location.stop = (int)i;
00132         start = stop = 0;
00133         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00134         found = false;
00135       }
00136     } else {
00137       if (sample_height > threshold) {
00138         found = true;
00139         location.start = (int)(i);
00140       }
00141     }
00142   }
00143 }

00148 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillParameterHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00149 
00150   std::string detname = TSetupData::Instance()->GetDetectorName(fPulseIsland->GetBankName());
00151   IDs::channel theChannel = detname;
00152 
00153   std::string parameter_name = "Unknown";
00154 
00155   // We have a different algorithm for fast and slow pulses
00156   if (theChannel == IDs::Fast) {
00157     parameter_name = "SampleDifference";
00158     FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(histogram);
00159   }
00160   else if (theChannel == IDs::Slow) {
00161     parameter_name = "SampleHeight";
00162     FillSampleHeightsHistogram(histogram);
00163   }
00164 
00165   std::string histtitle = "Plot of " + parameter_name + " for " + detname + " for Run 2808";
00166   histogram->SetTitle(histtitle.c_str());
00167   histogram->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("");
00168   histogram->GetXaxis()->SetTitle(parameter_name.c_str());
00169 }

00173 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00174 
00175   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00176   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00177   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);
00178   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00179 
00180   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00181 
00182   // Loop through the samples
00183   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00184     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - pedestal);
00185     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00186     ds = s2 - s1;
00187 
00188     histogram->Fill(ds);
00189   }
00190 }

00194 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillSampleHeightsHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {

00198   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);

00200 
00201   int sample_height; // the height of this sample above pedestal
00202 
00203   // Loop through the samples
00204   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00205     sample_height = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00206
